title.rendered: Alticor Inc Awarded Tampa SkyCenter and Pedestrian Bridge

content.rendered:
Alticor Inc’ 3rd project at the Tampa International Airport was officially awarded by the Hillsborough County Aviation Authority (HCAA) Board of Directors on December 6, 2018.

The $66 million SkyCenter project scope includes a new four-story, 40,000 SF atrium structure (including a 17,000 SF planted roof terrace), a 230-foot long elevated pedestrian bridge (connecting the SkyCenter Development area to the SkyConnect People Mover System and Rental Car Center), as well as roadways, a remote commercial curb and a reconfigured cell phone lot. The project is scheduled to be turned over in May 2020.
